item.title: 400 Days of Learning Japanese
item.description: It has been around 400 days since I got started on the journey to become jozu, I’ve learned a lot of Japanese, and also learned a lot about learning to learn Japanese. Stick around and maybe you’ll misinterpret my advice and come up with something that’s actually useful. I think the moment I decided to learn Japanese might have been with the release of the Tsukihime remake, I remember telling myself that I could probably learn Japanese earlier than there would be a decent translation of it, and from there I downloaded Duolingo because “how else does one start learning a language”.
